Changelog
---------

0.2.0 (2015-05-03)
++++++++++++++++++

Features:

- Add ``field_for`` function for generating marshmallow Fields from SQLAlchemy mapped class properties.

Support:

- Docs: Add "Overriding generated fields" section to "Recipes".

0.1.1 (2015-05-02)
++++++++++++++++++

Bug fixes:

- Fix ``keygetter`` class Meta option.

0.1.0 (2015-04-28)
++++++++++++++++++

- First release.
